AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Luis, Potosi, Mexico: starting point of the undocumented aliens' journey where Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero approached them
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: destination country of the undocumented aliens, where they were guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero to San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: intended destination within the United States for the group guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: location where the group purchased supplies before crossing the Rio Grande River into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande River: border crossing point between Mexico and the United States, where the group took canoes to enter the US
